title: Employment notice end
h1: When does your notice period end?
p1: Tell us when you'll finish with the respondent.

noticeEnds.required: Tell us when your notice period ends. For example, DD MM YYYY
noticeEnds.invalidDateMoreThanTenYearsInFuture: Enter a valid date, date must not be greater than 10 years from current date
noticeEnds.invalidDateInPast: Enter a valid date, date must not be in the past
noticeEnds.dayRequired: Enter a day for your notice period end date. For example, 23
noticeEnds.monthRequired: Enter a month for your notice period end date. For example, 04
noticeEnds.yearRequired: Enter the year when your notice period ends. For example, 2022
